item.title: SOAP in Perl
item.description: Since writing this guide we've created a Perl specific implementation and manual page. Check them out! Our Perl SOAP API examples perform simple retrieval operations and output results to your Perl console. We use the SOAP::Lite Perl module to handle generating our SOAP headers, generating our SOAP request, then interpreting the result from the method call. Each of these examples execute a single method call to retrieve its data. We'll start out with a simple direct call, implement an object mask, then combine the two.
